title: Articles on how to use Tiddly Wiki

text: TiddlyWiki Plugin Hiding The Sidebar On Startup.html
title: HideHeader

text: There is a sidebar with settings. It has a minimum width, so when your browser windows is not wide enough, the sidebar turns into a top menu bar. The below Tiddly describes a plugin that hides the sidebar / top menu bar on startup. External Links
title: Plugin for Hiding Sidebar

text:
Open every Tiddler:

```
[list[$:/StoryList]]
```


Open just Tiddlers with a certain tag:

```
[all[tiddlers]tag[UrTagName]sort[title]]
```

* Note: Replace UrTagName with your tag name
title: What is this Wiki Stuff?
